title: Contemporary Diamond-Cut Gold Kadas - "Jyothi Valayalu"
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Featuring a signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting lustre. Gold Weight: 51.210 grams
features: Modern geometric design with alternating square and diamond shapes that hold prong-set brilliant cut diamonds. The symmetrical pattern provides a contemporary twist on traditional bangle designs. The edges of the kadas are textured for added visual interest and comfort. The design is light and comfortable for daily wear.
colors: Lustrous gold enhanced by the sparkling white diamonds
creating a sophisticated and radiant appeal.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Adds a touch of elegance to any ensemble.
description: A blend of modern aesthetics and traditional Indian gold craftsmanship, these kadas offer a unique and elegant design. The high-quality diamonds add brilliance, and the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine. Their lightweight design ensures comfort throughout the day. A perfect gift for yourself or a loved one, these kadas are a timeless addition to any jewelry collection.
